block_action.description: The block action type to execute.
block_action.markdownDescription: The block action type to execute.

type.description:
## Block Action At

---


[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/block_action_at)

Executes a [Block Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/block_action_at) at the position of the entity.

Type ID: `origins:block_action_at`

---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:block_action_at",
    "block_action": {
        "type": "origins:set_block",
        "block": "minecraft:sand"
    }
}
```

This example will execute a [Set Block (Block Action Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/block_action_at) that would set a Sand block at the entity's feet.

title: Block Action At (Entity Action Type) date: 2021-04-05

Block Action At

Entity Action Type

Executes a Block Action Type at the position of the entity.

Type ID: origins:block_action_at

Fields

Field Type Default Description
block_action Block Action Type The block action type to execute.

Examples

"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:block_action_at",
    "block_action": {
        "type": "origins:set_block",
        "block": "minecraft:sand"
    }
}

This example will execute a Set Block (Block Action Type) that would set a Sand block at the entity's feet.
